statements: DELETE FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE machine_name = 'Machine XYZ';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Preventive Maintenance';
DELETE FROM machine_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'Routine Maintenance' AND maintenance_date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE technician_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Emergency Repair';
DELETE FROM maintenance_records WHERE technician='John Doe';
DELETE FROM service_technicians WHERE certification = 'Advanced' AND experience_years > 5
